title: Fact Vs Fiction: Cadbury Chocolates Contaminated With HIV?
subtitle: Fact Vs Fiction: Fake News Of The Week
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Did a worker adulterate Cadbury products with HIV infected blood? An old hoax targets Cadbury.

Watch episode-22 of Fact Vs Fiction where Jency Jacob and Suyash Barve discuss how BOOM debunked this viral message.

In this video we cover the following story:

Cadbury Chocolates Contaminated With HIV?: We Tell You Why It's Fake
